name: yafa-prompts
description: YAFA-prompts monorepo - AI prompt engineering platform (web, server, extension, desktop)

scripts.build: npm -w apps/web run build && npm -w apps/server run build
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm -w apps/server run dev" "npm -w apps/web run dev"
scripts.test: npm -w apps/web run test:run && npm -w apps/server run test:run
scripts.test:watch: concurrently "npm -w apps/web run test" "npm -w apps/server run test"
